summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2002 CHEVROLET SILVERADO.  THE VEHICLE FAILED INSPECTION BECAUSE THE PARKING BRAKE DID NOT OPERATE.  THE MECHANIC REPLACED THE REAR PARKING BRAKE SHOES.  THE CURRENT AND FAILURE MILEAGES WERE 69,500.   THE CONSUMER STATED VEHICLES WITH AUTOMATIC TRANSMSSIONS SHOULD HAVE BEEN INCLUDED IN THE RECALL. UPDATED 09/26/07. *JB
